title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Rocks & Minerals Kid's Page
body: Rocks and Minerals Kid's Page          Hello kids! I'm Master Leopold Bigbugh. I'm a real rock hound. I know the latest buzz about rocks and minerals. If you want to know more about me, see my biography. I hope that you are a bug about learning and want to know more about rocks and minerals. Check out these very cool Web sites:          Rockhound Home Page     San Diego Natural History Museum – Mineral Matters       Oracle – ThinkQuest – Rocks and Minerals     Mineralogy Society of America’s – Mineralogy for Kids       Rocks for Kids     Surfing the Net with Kids: Rocks       Rocks and Minerals – A to Z Home’s Cool Homeschooling Science     42explore: Rocks and Minerals             Click here to learn how to become an Official GEODETECTIVE member and get a cool patch.   GEODETECTIVE Home - Rocks and Minerals Home Contact our Education Outreach Specialist here
